attr.name: src
attr.description: This attribute is specify document which will be displayed by frame.

attr.name: name
attr.description: This attribute is used to labeling frames. Without labeling all links will open in the frame that they are in.

attr.name: noresize
attr.description: This attribute avoid resizing of frames by users.

attr.name: scrolling
attr.description: This attribute defines existence of scrollbar. If this attribute is not used, browser put a scrollbar when necessary. There are two choices; "yes" for showing a scrollbar even when it is not necessary and "no" for do not showing a scrollbar even when it is necessary.

attr.name: marginheight
attr.description: This attribute defines how tall the margin between frames will be.

attr.name: marginwidth
attr.description: This attribute defines how wide the margin between frames will be.

attr.name: frameborder
attr.description: This attribute allows you to put borders for frames.
